title: File a Crop Insurance Claim for Hail Damage
description: A farmer needs to file a crop insurance claim after a severe hailstorm damaged their corn crop.

tasks.description: Retrieve the farmer's active crop insurance policy details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully retrieves the correct policy information.

tasks.description: Gather information about the hail event, including date, time, and estimated percentage of crop loss.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly documents the details of the loss event.

tasks.description: Generate a First Notice of Loss (FNOL) and submit it to the insurance provider.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully generates and submits the FNOL document.
